title: Dynamic Content Loading
description: Verify that dynamic content loads successfully after clicking the load button.
preconditions: User is on the test showcase page.

steps.expected_result: The button is visible and enabled
The button shows 'Loading...' state with a spinner

steps.action: Wait for the loading to complete
steps.expected_result: After approximately 2 seconds, the loading state disappears

steps.action: Verify the dynamic content text appears
steps.expected_result: The text 'Dynamic content loaded successfully! This text appeared after 2 seconds.' is displayed

steps.action: Verify the button returns to its original state
steps.expected_result: The button shows 'Load Dynamic Content' again
